verses.roman:
punaḥ ihāṅ varṇile punarukti haya
vyartha likhana haya, āra grantha bāḍaya

synonyms: punaḥ—again; ihāṅ—here; varṇile—if I describe; punaḥ-ukti haya—it will be repetition; vyartha—useless; likhana—writing; haya—is; āra—and; grantha bāḍaya—increases the volume of the book.
translation: There is no use describing here the activities of the Lord again. It would simply be repetitious and would increase the size of this book.
